title: AIC Club
content:
The sky is unlimited


The Aircraft Investigation Club(ACI) was founded on September 14, 2021, when I was grade 9, by me and a senior student. We have a common interest in flying FPV drones and aircraft models, so we quickly get started. But soon, the senior co-founder was transfered to other school, lefting me and only a few other members.
This is the draft of our club planning initially created by the senior schoolmate⬇️

title: About me
content:
Welcome to my website ～(∠・ω< )～




Hello, welcome to my website! I would briefly introduce me to you in this page. My name is Tom and I am currently a grade 12 student at Tsinglan School located in Dongguan, which is not a well-known city between Shenzhen and Guangzhou.  I was born in Hong Kong and went to school there until 8th grade, then I started my journey in my current school. My Chinese name was super complicated in traditional Chinese,  but after coming to the mainland, simplified Chinese names are much easier to write.
I put many efforts to do this website, so hope you can learn more about me here.
